name: Vegan Alies (not from planet vega)
description:
Music made by https://superbastard.newgrounds.com/

Controls: Click with left mouse button on crops to make then shoot

Pepper: Click with left mouse button, hold, move the mouse in the oposite direction you want it to go, release

Vegan Aliens(not from planet vega) is a little game I've started developing in 2017. I've done pixel art for the first time for this project

My inital idea was to start making little games that didn't resolve in violence of any kind. So this game is about feeding aliens some vegetables.(I kinda cheat on this one because it's shooting but I tell they are eating hahha)
